title: Define project requirements and specifications
description: Develop a comprehensive document outlining the desired functionality of SynestheticSensoryEnhancer, including user needs, system requirements, and interface design.

title: Design the neural interface
description: Create a detailed design for the interface that allows users to control and interact with the SynestheticSensoryEnhancer.

title: Develop the neural implant hardware
description: Design and build the physical components of the SynestheticSensoryEnhancer that will interface with the user's nervous system.

title: Develop the software for the neural implant
description: Write the code that will interpret signals from the user's nervous system, process them according to the desired synesthetic or sensory enhancement effect, and send the processed signals back to the user.

title: Develop the mobile application for user control
description: Create an app that allows users to customize their SynestheticSensoryEnhancer experience, manage settings, and monitor device performance.

title: Test and validate the SynestheticSensoryEnhancer
description: Perform rigorous testing to ensure the device operates as intended, is safe for use, and delivers the desired sensory experiences.
dependencies: Develop the software for the neural implant
Develop the mobile application for user control

title: Secure the SynestheticSensoryEnhancer
description: Implement robust security measures to protect users' personal data and device functionality from unauthorized access.
dependencies: Develop the software for the neural implant

title: Document the SynestheticSensoryEnhancer
description: Create detailed technical documentation to guide developers, testers, and users in using, maintaining, and troubleshooting the device.
dependencies: Develop the software for the neural implant
Develop the mobile application for user control
